text:
* Paul Valthaty, a former Indian Premier League player, has been appointed as the head coach of the Seattle Thunderbolts in Minor League Cricket, a developmental league for Major League Cricket.

No other information about the Major League Cricket tournament is mentioned in the article. The rest of the article focuses on Paul Valthaty's past cricketing career and his new coaching role in Minor League Cricket.

* Steve Smith, the Australian cricket icon, led Washington Freedom to victory in the Major League Cricket 2024 (MLC).
* Smith was the tournament's second-highest run-scorer, accumulating 336 runs in nine matches, including three half-centuries.
* He averaged an impressive 56.00 with a strike rate of 148.67, reaffirming his status as one of cricket's premier batsmen.

These points highlight Smith's outstanding performance in the MLC, showcasing his leadership skills and batting prowess.
